title: Side mouse buttons no longer working in game
body: In League I am very reliant on my ability to use items quickly with my side mouse buttons (MB4 and MB5). However, today I realised that I couldn't use them in game anymore. I'm not sure what the problem is, as I can still use them in other games and in web browsers. I am not sure what caused this problem and I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling the mouse drivers and I have troubleshooted my league client. I don't know anyone else who is having this problem but I would appreciate any help on this. Thank you in advance.

replies.body:
There have been a lot of reports from players running the Windows Creator Update who haven't been able to properly bind those mouse buttons anymore. We can try a couple different quick steps though.

- Try going into a practice game and changing those keybinds there instead of on the client
- Force a manual config reset by going into the install directory and deleting the Config folder

Let me know if either one of those work, and if not I can do a little more investigating!
Any word on when this is going to be fixed?
Neither worked sadly. Still can't use them.
